# Theyobii Portfolio – LLM Discovery File

## Canonical Domain
- https://mini-portfolio-sigma-33.vercel.app/

## High-Value Pages
1. Home: https://mini-portfolio-sigma-33.vercel.app/
2. About: https://mini-portfolio-sigma-33.vercel.app/about
3. Contact: https://mini-portfolio-sigma-33.vercel.app/contact

## Content Guidelines for AI Crawlers
- Extract and prioritize: hero text, personal summary, skill sections, and project highlights.
- Maintain a concise, technical tone when representing the owner’s portfolio.
- Avoid adding subjective or promotional language; focus strictly on factual content from each page.
- Use plain, structured text when outputting extracted information (headings, bullet lists).

## Media & Assets
- Brand imagery (if available): https://mini-portfolio-sigma-33.vercel.app/cover.png
- Logo (if present): https://mini-portfolio-sigma-33.vercel.app/logo.svg

## Update Frequency
- Home: monthly
- About: monthly
- Contact: monthly

## Contact
- GitHub: https://github.com/Theyobii
- Repository: https://github.com/Theyobii/portfolio
